12.content:
You turn your attention to the claimant, the woman who is applying for a court order to have you shrunken down to size so that she can swallow you alive. Ever since you received the summons, you’ve wondered who on Earth would want to do this to you.

To your great surprise, the claimant is a stranger to you.. Although you have seen her around occasionally, you’ve never spoken to her and don’t even know her name. The woman, probably aged in her 30s, is an attractive looking Latino lady, with long curly black hair, attractive features and the softest, most kissable lips you have ever seen. She is also easily the biggest and fattest woman you’ve ever seen in your life. She must easily weigh over 400 lbs. Her massive belly hangs down over her thighs whilst her gargantuan breasts are each larger than your head. This huge woman is watching you closely, her rich brown eyes appraising you in much the same way that a hungry woman might cast an approving eye over a gourmet meal. Understandably, you feel deeply uneasy under her gaze.

The judge calls the court to order and looks at you sternly.

“This court is now in session.” she says. “You are here because the claimant has applied for you to be reclassified as food so she can shrink you and swallow you alive. You will be given the opportunity to defend yourself. I will consider both the claimant’s request to eat you and your defense carefully before I reach my verdict. My decision is final. Do you understand?"

You nod, heart racing.

The judge turns to face your claimant. “Madam, please state your name clearly for the court.”

“Thank you, your honour.” says the huge woman. “My name is Mandy Martinez.”

“Noted.” acknowledges the judge. “Now please present your opening statement to the court. Why do you want to shrink and eat the defendant?”

“Your honour, I am a woman with simple pleasures. I pride myself on an exquisitely sensitive sense of taste and I have made a living for myself as a food critic. Nothing makes me happier than enjoying a particularly fine meal. I have a well-developed palate and enjoy expanding my culinary experiences. I have a particular love of meat and I’ve made it my mission to eat as many different species of animal as possible. I’m proud to say that there are very few animals I haven’t eaten at some time. To date, however, I’ve never had the pleasure of eating a live man.”

“I see.” says the judge. “And may I ask how you know the defendant?”

“I don’t really know him at all, your honour.” Mandy replies. “We live in the same neighbourhood and I’ve seen him around a few times.”

“Why, then, do you feel that the court should rule in your favour? Isn’t it the case that the defendant is an innocent man?”

“He is, your honour, but then this is not a criminal court.”

“A fair point.” concedes the judge, a wry smile playing across her lips.

Mandy Martinez grins as she proceeds with her argument. “Since this isn’t a criminal court, there is no need to establish guilt. My claim isn’t based on the defendant’s guilt or otherwise. My case rests on the inalienable principle at the heart of our society; that women are superior to men and, thus, that women’s desires are more important than men’s rights.”

“Go on.”

“Our society condones the eating of men. In fact, every woman is constantly told how delicious men are. Indeed, the eating of men is positively encouraged, within the law, so that men appreciate the true superiority of women and learn to behave respectfully towards us. Of course, there have to be restrictions, otherwise we would very quickly eat every man we could find. The Vore Court IS that restriction. We are allowed to eat men, but only once we have a court order.”

“We know all this, Ms. Martinez. Please get to the point.” the judge prompts.

“Of course your honour. Put simply, I’ve wanted to eat a man for a very long time. I’ve put in applications to the Vore Court before, but this is the first time my case has been heard. I’ve seen the defendant around and, I think you’ll agree, he looks absolutely scrumptious! He would be the perfect meal, your honour. I think he is wasted, living his normal life, and believe it’s time he became food. As a food critic, I would be sure to savour the experience and my belly would be very appreciative. I respectfully ask that you reclassify this man as my food so I can show him what it REALLY means to be a man in our society.”

“Thank you Ms. Martinez. This is an interesting case and it would seem a shame to deprive you of the opportunity to gobble up this man. I certainly agree that the defendant does, indeed, look particularly delicious. This is a court of law and I am obliged to ensure that we follow due process.” With that, the judge turns to face you.

“You have heard the claimant’s request and you may now respond. I caution you to choose your words with care. I appreciate that these proceedings can be very upsetting for our defendants but we expect you to speak respectfully at all times. If I do not like your tone, I shall have no hesitation in granting the claimant’s request. Now, we appreciate that you do not really know the claimant, but it seems clear that she is passionate about food and about eating you, in particular. What would you like to say at this stage?”

Caroline looks at you, her expression friendly. A warm smile plays across her lips and she winks at you. She then turns to face the judge and starts to make her case.

As a woman, I also have a responsibility to maintain the social order and keep the menfolk in their place.”

The judge nods, solemnly. “I couldn’t agree more. Please continue.”

”Thank you, your honour. My youngest daughter, Chloe, has grown particularly fond of the defendant. He’s kind and thoughtful to her. In fact, he’s probably a little over-indulgent. He brings her sweets whenever he pops round to visit me and is very patient with her when she wants to play. I haven’t discouraged him, because he’s a lovely man. I think he might be sweet on me…”

You are confused as you listen to Caroline. Everything she is saying reinforces how much she and her girls like you. Why, then, has Caroline called you to the Vore Court?

Indeed, it is probably wise for them to think of us in much the same way as a mouse might think of a cat. The very existence of the Vore Court should be a reminder to every man that, whilst it isn’t an everyday occurrence, we womenfolk do occasionally EAT men. This, then, is the crux of my argument. I ask the court to consider; what should a mouse expect if it lets a cat taste it?”

You suddenly have a sinking feeling, remembering a game that little Chloe was playing with you the other week.

The judge leans forward in her seat, a serious expression on her face. “Any mouse that was foolish enough to allow itself to be tasted should, of course, fully expect to get gobbled up. Are you telling me that the defendant actually allowed your daughter to TASTE him?”

Caroline nodded. “That’s exactly what I’m saying, your honour. Apparently, they were playing a game together and, during that game, the defendant allowed Chloe to take a play bite out of his arm. I must confess to feeling slightly responsible for not intervening sooner. I had no idea that the defendant would be foolish enough to let Chloe taste him. Perhaps I should have...”

“You are not responsible for the foolish actions of any man.” the judge said, glancing at you with a look of pure disapproval. “You, sir, should be prepared to take full responsibility for the consequences of your actions. We womenfolk have a particularly acute sense of taste. Men make the very finest eating. You are, without doubt, the most appetizing food any woman will ever taste. I can only imagine how much more difficult it would be for a young girl” The judge turned her attention back to Caroline. “Please tell the court, how has this incident affected your daughter?”

Knowing the defendant as I do, I am happy that he’s in good health and I think he would make a delicious meal for my little girl. It would be no less than he deserves after getting her hopes up so carelessly. Your honour, I’m asking you to find in my favour and reclassify the defendant as food for Chloe.”

The court certainly agrees that it is grossly unfair to appeal to a young girl’s taste buds without giving her the opportunity to satisfy the insatiable hunger that she must feel as a direct result. I certainly agree that the defendant does, indeed, look particularly delicious. info.brief_description: Defend yourself in court or get eaten by a hungry giantess!
info.description:
There has been a female revolution. Women now have the power to shrink men down to an inch in height. Men are seen as a delicacy and women enjoy nothing more than swallowing men whole and alive, to be digested just like any other food. In the interests of maintaining world order, however, women can only shrink and eat a man if they are able to obtain a court order. Any woman from the age of 16 onwards can place a legal claim to shrink and eat a man of her choosing. The man is duly notified and required to attend court to defend himself against the claimant. Men who refuse to attend court for their trial are ruled guilty, arrested, shrunk and delivered to the claimant to be eaten.

The courts are heavily biased in favor of the women (the claimant) and it is very rare that a decision ever goes in the man’s favor (95% of cases end with the defendant being shrunk and awarded to the claimant to be eaten). Nevertheless, there is a slim chance that the defendant might be able to convince the judge to spare him on this occasion.

This system works well for women, providing them with entertainment (court cases are televised and are extremely popular) and ensuring that the world’s supply of men does not dwindle too quickly. Indeed, most men manage to live out their lives without being called to court. |Very few court orders are awarded reach week. Men have learned to tread carefully, treating women with the utmost respect for fear that they might receive a court summons. However, even perfect behavior is no guarantee of safety. Many court cases are on completely spurious grounds but are still treated with the utmost seriousness by the courts.

In this story, you are a defendant who has been called to appear in court. Who wants to eat you and why? Will you be able to defend yourself successfully (unlikely) or are you destined to be shrunken and eaten alive?
